description:
Configure some common values needed to talk to the server. Each key represents a configurable value.  All keys are optional. Missing keys will use a default value
Valid keys are:
serverProtocol: Either 'http' or 'https'. Defaults to 'https'.
serverHost    : The name of the server host.  Defaults to 'localhost'.
basePath      : An addition path part to prefix to all route paths. Defaults to ''.
serverPort    : The server port to connect to.  Defaults to null.
